name: Hrubyi Oleksandr
experienceSubtitle: I live in Ukraine. Due to the war in my country and the unknown economic situation, I am considering working abroad. I am currently working for a company that develops and maintains crypto exchanges. I am supporting 10 exchanges. All the information that interests you about the projects and what exactly the functionality was developed, I will tell and show at the online meeting. Thank you very much for your attention.
aboutAdditional: I am a big fan of skiing and snowboarding. I also like travel and lead a healthy lifestyle. Really want to join a cool team to create modern projects.
